stories.title: The Neighbor's Secret
stories.excerpt: When I discovered what my neighbor was hiding in her basement...
stories.author: Elena Darkwood
stories.content:
The grand ballroom glittered with a thousand candles. Everyone wore masks, creating an air of mystery and possibility. I didn't recognize a soul - until I saw him.

Even with the ornate fox mask covering half his face, I knew it was Lord Alistair. We'd exchanged letters for months, but never met in person. His presence was magnetic, drawing me across the crowded room.

"My raven," he murmured, taking my hand. His voice was exactly as I'd imagined - deep and resonant.

We danced, his hand firm on my back, guiding me through steps I didn't know I knew. With each turn, he pulled me closer, until our bodies were flush against each other, scandalously close for a public ball.

"I can't bear this charade any longer," he whispered against my ear. "Come with me."

He led me through hidden passages to a private balcony overlooking the moonlit gardens. There, he removed his mask, and I saw the face I'd dreamed of for so long.

His kiss was demanding, claiming. My mask fell to the floor as his hands roamed my body, loosening laces, exposing skin to the cool night air. Against the stone balustrade, he took me with a passion that matched the intensity of our letters.

Later, as we lay entangled on a velvet chaise, he traced patterns on my bare skin. "I've waited a lifetime for this," he confessed.

In that moment, the masks we'd both worn - literal and figurative - fell away completely, revealing a connection that would change both our lives forever.
